title: Yarali-ye Sofla
content:
Yarali-ye Sofla (Persian: يارعلي سفلي, also Romanized as Yār‘alī-ye Soflá) is a village in Nurali Rural District, in the Central District of Delfan County, Lorestan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 21, in 4 families.


== References ==
